definition: Chinese goldthread (Coptis chinensis), rhizome used in medicine
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
surname Lian
no choice but to suffer in silence (idiom)/also written 啞巴吃黃蓮|哑巴吃黄莲/(often precedes 有苦說不出|有苦说不出[you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1])
to be forced to suffer in silence (idiom)/unable to speak of one's bitter suffering/sometimes written 啞子吃黃連，有苦說不出|哑子吃黄连，有苦说不出
pinyin: ya3 ba5 chi1 huang2 lian2 , you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1
containing_words.word: 哑巴吃黄连，有苦说不出

sentences.english: Quantitative analysis on different proportions of couple of Coptis and Scute.
sentences.chinese: 对黄连与黄芩的不同比例配伍进行定量研究。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the extraction technology of Huanglian Jiedu Decoction.
sentences.chinese: 目的选择黄连解毒汤方药的提取工艺。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the allergic reaction of Shuanghuanglian Injection(SI)and chlorogenic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察绿原酸和注射用双黄连的致敏性。

sentences.english: Rhizoma coptidis was extracted with water, and silk fabrics were dyed with the extract.
sentences.chinese: 用水提取黄连并用该提取液对丝绸进行染色。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To determine the chlorogenic acid contents in Shuanghuanglian oral solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定双黄连口服液中绿原酸的含量。

sentences.english: The content of oil in the seeds is high, which is good material for bio-diesel oil.
sentences.chinese: 黄连木种子含油率高，是生产生物柴油的好原料。

sentences.english: The primary active ingredienn are berberine and hydrastine alkaloids, among others.
sentences.chinese: 非洲防已碱是一种与黄连素联系密切的生物碱。

sentences.english: Conclusion Berberine has good cure effect on metabolism syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 结论黄连素治疗代谢综合症有较好的疗效。

sentences.english: To optimize the best technique for preparation of Shuanghuanglian(double coptis chinensis) Dripping Pill and to determine its dissolution limit.
sentences.chinese: 优选双黄连滴丸的最佳制备工艺并进行溶出时限检查。

sentences.english: The method can be used for quality control of Huanglian Yanggan Pills.
sentences.chinese: 可用于控制黄连羊肝丸的质量。

sentences.english: Objectiv To evaluate the effect of the Shuang Huanglian inhaled in the gasping pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价双黄连雾化吸入对喘憋性肺炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Berberine (Ber), an isoquinoline-type alkaloid, has significant antibacterial effect.
sentences.chinese: 黄连素属于异喹啉生物碱，具有显著的抗菌作用。

sentences.english: The experimental group was treated with coptis chinensis compound while the control group was only perfused with sterile water.
sentences.chinese: 实验组灌喂复方黄连，对照组裸鼠仅灌喂无菌水。

sentences.english: SYNOPSIS: Guyanling is a composite Chinese medicine made up of Coptis chinensis Franch, and some other herbs.
sentences.chinese: 骨炎灵是由黄连等中药组成的复方制剂。

sentences.english: The seeds of Coptis chinensis need stratification to break dormancy.
sentences.chinese: 黄连种子需要在低温条件下才能解除休眠。

sentences.english: Sister is already dumb, and it still fails I eat Coptis?
sentences.chinese: 姐经已系哑巴咗，唔通还得食黄连唔成？

definition: Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
bitter orange (Fructus aurantii) (used in TCM)
licorice root
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
Manchurian wild ginger (family Asarum)
the root bark of the peony tree
Wolfiporia extensa (a wood-decay fungus)/fu ling/tuckahoe
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
reed rhizome (used in TCM)
Anemarrhena asphodeloides/rhyzome of Anemarrhena (used in TCM)
blackberry lily (Belamcanda chinensis)/leopard lily
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
honeysuckle
